chapters.title: Chapter 19: Shadow's Waiting
chapters.info: Rhea, p. 244—Wife of Caar, son of Thorin, the king of Manetheren during the time Mordeth was in power in Aridhol. She killed her husband, and after he was buried killed herself upon his grave. See also al Thorin al Toren, Caar; Mordeth.

chapters.title: Chapter 32: Four Kings in Shadow
chapters.info: Rhea, p. 396—Subject of a song Rand knows. It is called “Jolly Jaim” where Rand learned it, but in Four Kings it is known as “Rhea's Fling.”
